title: Canfield Jedi 29 is a High-Pivot Downhill Bike w/ Formula 1 Suspension
content:
Canfield Bikes has updated its flagship downhill bike, the Canfield Jedi, now kitted out with a 29″ wheelset and a revised version of the High-Pivot Formula 1 Suspension platform. Throughout its 203mm rear wheel travel, the Jedi’s effective rear centre lengthens by a substantial 19mm. This multi-link incarnation of a high pivot suspension platform is

The post Canfield Jedi 29 is a High-Pivot Downhill Bike w/ Formula 1 Suspension appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
